knimeNode.name: Workflow Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write the current workflow to a FSX file.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to save the current workflow with all its nodes and connections except the workflow reader itself in an FSKX file. This workflow will be copied and saved in a meta node. The output ports of the selected node will be exported using the output ports of the meta node.
fullDescription.option: Location to file. May be an absolute URL, a mount-point relative URL or a local path.
The user must select which of the present nodes should be used to export the output ports to the meta node.
